boxes.title: The Premier Choice for all your NDT needs
boxes.body1: What can we do for you?

mission.body: To provide industry leading testing. Use synergy and innovation to empower our partners to achieve more. Operate everyday of business with the same integrity that the company was founded on. Take nondestructive testing to the next level of efficiency, quality, and affordability.

standards.body: We hold ourselves to rigorous standards at Southern Industrial Services, and are constantly seeking to improve and innovate. We are extremel confident in our ability to perform the highest quality of inspections on the job
